ComicInfo.Summary: Hulk is reverted back to Bruce Banner by an act of brute force. Banner can only watch in horror as the Counter-Earth battle rages on in D.C. Who is the madman posturing as President of Counter-Earth? And will Hulk be able to save his friend Adam Warlock from certain execution?
ComicInfo.Tags: High Evolutionary,Adam Warlock,David Carter,Jason Grey,Hulk,High Evolutionary's Counter-Earth,New Men,Virginia,Astrella,Washington D.C.,Porcupinus,Ellie Roberts,Recorder,Man-Beast
ComicInfo.Title: Triumph on Terra-Two!
ComicInfo.Writer: Gerry Conway,Roy Thomas,Tony Isabella,Tony Isabella,Gerry Conway,Roy Thomas
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
